messages.text: Hello everyone! I'm Vighnesh, a drummer of 8 years  and I was going through projects when I found automated music generation. I have read the resources and found it to be right my my alley. I also learnt the basics of Flux and just wrote a simple model in it. I would like to know more as to how I can start working towards contributing to this project. I would love to connect to anyone who can point me in the right direction! I'm looking forward!

messages.text:
Greetings everyone! I'm a senior year UG at IIT Kanpur, India aiming at this year's GSoC & JSoC. Came across Julia for performing large-scale simulations and loved it! I've sound background in Numerical Methods, Linear algebra & DEs and am interested in contributing to GenericLinearAlgebra.jl; TaylorModels.jl & Discretizations of PDEs.
Please tag the potential mentors. Thanks in advance :)
